#summary Simple (and somewhat restricted) XML parser/printer.
#labels XML

= Introduction =

Simple (and somewhat restricted) XML parser/printer.


= Details =

This is a simple XML parser/printer. This artifact is fully applicable to an XML library and there are some restrictions.

== Simple XML ==
  * There are only attributes, elements, and texts.
  * No other types are supported.
  * No ignorable white spaces.
  * No mixed content. Elements always prior to texts.
  * Automatic links to other wiki pages
